details.group_dynamic_select: SELECT DISTINCT(system.system_id) FROM system LEFT JOIN oa_group_sys ON (system.system_id = oa_group_sys.system_id) LEFT JOIN sys_sw_windows ON (system.system_id = sys_sw_windows.system_id AND system.timestamp = sys_sw_windows.timestamp) LEFT JOIN oa_org ON (system.man_org_id = oa_org.org_id) WHERE oa_group_sys.group_id = '1' AND system.man_os_group = 'Windows' AND sys_sw_windows.windows_user_name IS NOT NULL AND system.system_id NOT IN ( SELECT system.system_id FROM system LEFT JOIN oa_group_sys ON (system.system_id = oa_group_sys.system_id) LEFT JOIN sys_sw_software ON (system.system_id = sys_sw_software.system_id AND system.timestamp = sys_sw_software.timestamp) WHERE oa_group_sys.group_id = '1' AND sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE '%Symantec%Endpoint%')
details.group_display_sql: SELECT system.man_icon, system.system_id, system.hostname, system.man_os_family, system.man_description, system.man_ip_address, system.man_os_name, sys_sw_windows.windows_user_name, oa_location.location_name FROM system LEFT JOIN sys_sw_windows ON (system.system_id = sys_sw_windows.system_id AND system.timestamp = sys_sw_windows.timestamp) LEFT JOIN oa_location ON (system.man_location_id = oa_location.location_id) LEFT JOIN oa_group_sys ON (system.system_id = oa_group_sys.system_id) WHERE oa_group_sys.group_id = ? group by system_id
details.group_description: Any items that have their status attribute set to 'production' and do not have an installed software package named 'Symantec Endpoint'.
